actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution for the appointment of a select committee to study the effects of Federal policies on the quality of education in the United States.

summary.text: Creates a Select Committee in the House of Representatives to be composed of eleven Members to be appointed by the Speaker to conduct a full and complete investigation and study of the effect of Federal laws on the quality of education in the United States. Grants the Committee necessary powers.

titles.title: A resolution for the appointment of a select committee to study the effects of Federal policies on the quality of education in the United States.
